abstractText: This method was used to estimate the water velocity at fish locations within the EntiatRiver main stem to validate winter Habitat Suitability Index models for juvenilespring Chinook and steelhead.Focal velocity describes water movement at the location of the fish. Focal velocity is recorded for all captured and uncaptured fish during the day survey.
title: Estimate Focal Water Velocity at Fish Locations within the Stream v1.0
